ffmpeg.description: Integer Overflow vulnerability in function filter16_prewitt in libavfilter/vf_convolution.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts.
ffmpeg.name: CVE-2020-20898
ffmpeg.title: CVE-2020-20898 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

ffmpeg.description: Integer Overflow vulnerability in function filter16_sobel in libavfilter/vf_convolution.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts.
ffmpeg.name: CVE-2021-38091
ffmpeg.title: CVE-2021-38091 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

ffmpeg.description: An issue was discovered in the FFmpeg package, where vp3_decode_frame in libavcodec/vp3.c lacks check of the return value of av_malloc() and will cause a null pointer dereference, impacting availability.
ffmpeg.name: CVE-2022-3109
ffmpeg.title: CVE-2022-3109 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

ffmpeg.description: Integer Overflow vulnerability in function filter_prewitt in libavfilter/vf_convolution.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts.
ffmpeg.name: CVE-2021-38092
ffmpeg.title: CVE-2021-38092 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

ffmpeg.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic was found in ffmpeg. This vulnerability affects the function smc_encode_stream of the file libavcodec/smcenc.c of the component QuickTime Graphics Video Encoder. The manipulation of the argument y_size leads to out-of-bounds read. The attack can be initiated remotely. The name of the patch is 13c13109759090b7f7182480d075e13b36ed8edd. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-213544.
ffmpeg.name: CVE-2022-3965
ffmpeg.title: CVE-2022-3965 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

ffmpeg.description: Integer Overflow vulnerability in function filter_sobel in libavfilter/vf_convolution.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts.
ffmpeg.name: CVE-2021-38094
ffmpeg.title: CVE-2021-38094 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

ffmpeg.description: FFmpeg 7.0 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow. There is a negative-size-param bug at libavcodec/mpegvideo_enc.c:1216:21 in load_input_picture in FFmpeg7.0
ffmpeg.name: CVE-2024-32230
ffmpeg.title: CVE-2024-32230 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

ffmpeg.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in ffmpeg. This affects an unknown part of the file libavcodec/rpzaenc.c of the component QuickTime RPZA Video Encoder. The manipulation of the argument y_size leads to out-of-bounds read. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The name of the patch is 92f9b28ed84a77138105475beba16c146bdaf984. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-213543.
ffmpeg.name: CVE-2022-3964
ffmpeg.title: CVE-2022-3964 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

ffmpeg.name: CVE-2021-38093
ffmpeg.title: CVE-2021-38093 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

ffmpeg.description: libavcodec/pthread_frame.c in FFmpeg before 5.1.2, as used in VLC and other products, leaves stale hwaccel state in worker threads, which allows attackers to trigger a use-after-free and execute arbitrary code in some circumstances (e.g., hardware re-initialization upon a mid-video SPS change when Direct3D11 is used).

libpostproc55.description: An issue was discovered in the FFmpeg package, where vp3_decode_frame in libavcodec/vp3.c lacks check of the return value of av_malloc() and will cause a null pointer dereference, impacting availability.
libpostproc55.name: CVE-2022-3109
libpostproc55.title: CVE-2022-3109 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

libpostproc55.description: Integer Overflow vulnerability in function filter_prewitt in libavfilter/vf_convolution.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts.
libpostproc55.name: CVE-2021-38092
libpostproc55.title: CVE-2021-38092 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

libpostproc55.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic was found in ffmpeg. This vulnerability affects the function smc_encode_stream of the file libavcodec/smcenc.c of the component QuickTime Graphics Video Encoder. The manipulation of the argument y_size leads to out-of-bounds read. The attack can be initiated remotely. The name of the patch is 13c13109759090b7f7182480d075e13b36ed8edd. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-213544.
libpostproc55.name: CVE-2022-3965
libpostproc55.title: CVE-2022-3965 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

libpostproc55.description: Integer Overflow vulnerability in function filter_sobel in libavfilter/vf_convolution.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts.
libpostproc55.name: CVE-2021-38094
libpostproc55.title: CVE-2021-38094 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

libpostproc55.description: FFmpeg 7.0 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow. There is a negative-size-param bug at libavcodec/mpegvideo_enc.c:1216:21 in load_input_picture in FFmpeg7.0
libpostproc55.name: CVE-2024-32230
libpostproc55.title: CVE-2024-32230 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

libpostproc55.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in ffmpeg. This affects an unknown part of the file libavcodec/rpzaenc.c of the component QuickTime RPZA Video Encoder. The manipulation of the argument y_size leads to out-of-bounds read. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The name of the patch is 92f9b28ed84a77138105475beba16c146bdaf984. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-213543.
libpostproc55.name: CVE-2022-3964
libpostproc55.title: CVE-2022-3964 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

libpostproc55.description: Integer Overflow vulnerability in function filter16_roberts in libavfilter/vf_convolution.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts.
libpostproc55.name: CVE-2021-38090
libpostproc55.title: CVE-2021-38090 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

libpostproc55.description: Integer Overflow vulnerability in function filter_robert in libavfilter/vf_convolution.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts.
libpostproc55.name: CVE-2021-38093
libpostproc55.title: CVE-2021-38093 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more

libpostproc55.description: libavcodec/pthread_frame.c in FFmpeg before 5.1.2, as used in VLC and other products, leaves stale hwaccel state in worker threads, which allows attackers to trigger a use-after-free and execute arbitrary code in some circumstances (e.g., hardware re-initialization upon a mid-video SPS change when Direct3D11 is used).
libpostproc55.name: CVE-2022-48434
libpostproc55.title: CVE-2022-48434 - libavfilter7, libavformat58 and 7 more
